block.p: HELLERSTEIN-Rose. The Board of Jewish Education of Greater New York extends its condolences to our former President, the Hon. Alvin K. Hellerstein, on the passing of his beloved mother, Rose. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Avrom I. Doft, President Philip Schatten, Chairman Chaim Lauer, Executive VP

HELLERSTEIN-Rose. The Ramaz School Family mourns the passing of the beloved mother of its devoted alumni parent, former Trustee, and generous benefactor, Honorary Alvin K. Hellerstein and extends heartfelt sympathy to all members of the bereaved family. Rabbi Haskel Lookstein, Principal David N. Kahn, Chairman, Board of Trustees

HELLERSTEIN-Rose. The partners, associates and staff of Stroock & Stroock & Lavan mourn the passing of Mrs. Rose Hellerstein, mother of Judge Alvin K. Hellerstein and grandmother of our colleague Joseph Hellerstein.
